commit.message:
PR c++/51191 - ICE on alias of alias template instantiation

gcc/cp/

	PR c++/51191
	* pt.c (primary_template_instantiation_p): Don't forget to
	consider alias declarations.

gcc/testsuite/

	PR c++/51191
	* g++.dg/cpp0x/alias-decl-13.C: New test.

From-SVN: r181475

+
+	PR c++/51191
+	* pt.c (primary_template_instantiation_p): Don't forget to
+	consider alias declarations.
+
